title: Purpose
context: PART I. GENERAL PROVISIONS ยง323D-1 Purpose. The purpose of this chapter is to establish a health planning and resources development program to promote accessibility for all the people of the State to quality health care services at reasonable cost. [L 1975, c 159, pt of ยง2; ree L 1977, c 178, pt of ยง2; am L 1987, c 270, ยง3]
